attributes.additional_details: Because frankly in these trying times he has done so much to help and take our minds of current events with his selfless deeds and I think that if anyone deserves a knighthood it's him
attributes.background: I would like to shine the fact that Tom Moore has done an I credible service to his country and I would like to see him get his day with the queen and get knighted

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
